title: Happy holidays :D
body:
I know that alot of people in league are salty or even toxic, but im not one of those people. I go into every game saying Happy holidays and merry christmas just for the sheer joy of it :D. So since i can't play everyone i thought i would write it here in the boards. I personally do not celebrate christmas as i am muslim, so i won't get presents and such (unlike others who will) but i do wish everyone else a Merry christmas and Happy holidays. :D. Feel free to reply and talk together down below :D

Merry christmas :D and Happy Holidays to each and all! :D

replies.body:
Merry XMas and Happy Holidays to you too! 

http://pre07.deviantart.net/5c73/th/pre/f/2015/348/d/a/anivia_merry_christmas_by_razielbr333-d9k72vi.jpg

(credit to reazielbr333 :3)
You are a serious ice burd fanatic.

Chill out, birdbrain.

This pun doesn't even work.
{{champion:133}} Excuse me sir, would you like to hear about our bird and saviour Quinn?
Happy holidays! Keep up the happy spirits!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Koalifier,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=muyuw5YU,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-12-24T01:37:07.524+0000)
>
> Happy holidays! Keep up the happy spirits!

Thanks, that means a lot coming from a rioter them self. Happy holidays to you as well! :D

So you will specifically greet Christians but not Ramadan, Eid al-Fitr, Saint Nicholas Day, Eid'ul-Adha, Fiesta of Our Lady of Guadalupe, St. Lucia Day, Hanukkah, Three Kings Day/Epiphany, Boxing Day, Kwanzaa, Omisoka, Yule, or Saturnalia?

Just kidding. Happy Holidays works.

Happy Holidays! :D
Thanks everyone! It means a lot, Happy holidays to everyone :D.
Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays to you too!  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays to you too!!
Happy holidays and Merry Christmas to you too! :)
Thing is i would, but lots of those things i didn't even know XD and eid and ramadaan passed anyways. Im sorry bout that you are right. XD But thanks and Happy holidays to you too man :D <3
